issue.title: [Python] Utilize common toolchain build scripts between manylinux1, manylinux2010
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5733](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5733). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Reduce code duplication by maintaining common dependency build scripts

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5733?focusedCommentId=17287484) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
We aren't building manylinux1 wheels anymore
